spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout resembles the plan (central hall, left bedroom, bathroom zone, right bedroom, living + dining/kitchen), but multiple placement issues: the kitchen/dining zone is reconfigured (window moved to right wall and counters not matching the L-shape), the small top-center/right office/study room from the plan is not clearly preserved as a distinct room, and several door locations/hinge orientations do not match the 2D arcs. Room sizes/proportions appear altered (hallway widened, left bedroom and service rooms compressed).

structural_fidelity.notes: Major adjacency is mostly maintained (hall connects to bedrooms/living), but fidelity breaks in the top-center/right service area: the plan shows two separate small rooms (bath + office) with distinct doors; the render appears to merge/repurpose that area. Some wall runs and interior partitions differ in length and alignment versus the plan, and window/door embedding does not consistently match the drawn openings.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not map reliably to the 2D plan: the left bedroom in the plan has two single beds, but the render shows one bed; the dedicated office/study furniture is not placed in the corresponding small room (desk appears in the bedroom instead). Kitchen layout and dining adjacency are simplified/changed relative to the plan. Scales are generally plausible but not faithful to the plan’s arrangement.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric render with consistent materials and generally good lighting. Camera is a correct isometric-like angle and geometry is mostly clean. However, some openings and partitions look simplified, and a few door placements feel visually inconsistent with typical clearance (minor compositional/architectural clarity issues).

detected_errors.description: Missing/unclear dedicated office/study room as a distinct space per the 2D plan (top-center/right small room with desk).
Kitchen window placement differs: 2D plan indicates a window/opening on the bottom exterior wall near the sink area; 3D render places a large window on the right exterior wall instead.
Kitchen counter layout differs from the 2D L-shaped configuration; render simplifies/reshapes counters and appliance placement.
Left bedroom bed count mismatch: 2D shows two single beds; 3D shows a single bed (one bed missing).
Several interior door swing/orientation relationships do not match the 2D door arcs (hinge side/open direction inconsistent in the hall/service-room zone).
Proportion distortion: central hall appears wider and the top service rooms/left bedroom appear compressed compared to the 2D plan.
Furniture relocation: desk/office function appears placed in the bedroom rather than in the small office location shown in the plan.
